name: PayPal bttn for Commerce Demo
description: A super-cool implementation of bttn and Braintree APIs that allow for you to buy something at the push of a bttn!

braintree_environment.description: Braintree - Should be either Sandbox or Production

braintree_merchantId.description: Braintree - The merchantId for your account

braintree_privateKey.description: Braintree - The private key for your account

braintree_publicKey.description: Braintree - The public key for your account

BT_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Braintree - An API value that is used to keep track of the channel that a transaction came from

BTTN_API_KEY.description: BTTN - The API key provided by bttn

BTTN_API_MERCHANT_NAME.description: BTTN - The merchant name provided by bttn

SLACK_ENABLE.description: Slack - Enable Slack notifications for user actions

SLACK_URL.description: Slack - The webhook URL to use
